title: Swansea City keen on Fulham right-back Ryan Fredericks
description: Swansea City are interested in signing Fulham right-back Ryan Fredericks, according to Sky sources.
content: The Welsh club have prioritised a right-back and a striker in the January transfer window.Fredericks, 25, arrived at Craven Cottage in the summer of 2015 from Bristol City and is out of contract at the end of the season.The Tottenham product has featured predominantly at right-back under Slavisa Jokanovic at Fulham and has clearly caught the eye of Swansea's new boss Carlos Carvalhal.Fredericks came through the ranks at Spurs and made his first-team debut against Hearts in the Europa League in 2011.Carvalhal will be desperate to shore up his defence with his side bottom of the Premier League with 16 games left in the season.
